title: Project Management Maturity Diagnosis and Improvement Process for Educational/Training Product Development Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational/training product development and basic project management concepts
context.additional_context: For managers involved in developing language education/training products, provides project management maturity assessment and competency enhancement training

learning_goals: Participating organizations can measure project management maturity levels using diagnostic tools.
Learners can understand the role differences between project managers and instructional designers and develop collaboration strategies.
Participating companies can identify and apply formal training requirements needed for project leaders.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
